returns._elasticBandRewardBIPS: Hybrid reward band, where _elasticBandRewardBIPS goes to the  elastic band (prices within _elasticBandWidthPPM of the median)  and 10000 - elasticBandRewardBIPS to the IQR
returns._elasticBandWidthPPM: Prices within _elasticBandWidthPPM of median are rewarded
returns._highAssetUSDThreshold: Threshold for high asset vote power
returns._lowAssetUSDThreshold: Threshold for low asset vote power
returns._maxVotePowerAssetThresholdFraction: High threshold for asset vote power per voter
returns._maxVotePowerNatThresholdFraction: High threshold for native token vote power per voter
returns._trustedAddresses: Trusted addresses - use their prices if low nat turnout is not achieved

getAsset().details: Asset is null in case of multi-asset FTSO

getAssetFtsos().details: AssetFtsos is not null only in case of multi-asset FTSO

returns._timestamp: Time when price was updated for the last time

returns._lastPriceEpochFinalizationType: Finalization type of last finalized price epoch

returns._priceFinalizationType: Finalization type when price was updated for the last time

returns._price: Price in USD multiplied by ASSET_PRICE_USD_DECIMALS
returns._timestamp: Time when price was updated for the last time

params._timestamp: Timestamp as seconds from unix epoch

returns._0: Price in USD multiplied by ASSET_PRICE_USD_DECIMALS
Price in USD multiplied by ASSET_PRICE_USD_DECIMALS

getPriceEpochData().details: half-closed intervals - end time not included

returns._epochRevealEndTime: End time of the current epoch price reveal as seconds from unix epoch
returns._epochSubmitEndTime: End time of the current epoch price submission as seconds from unix epoch
returns._fallbackMode: Current epoch in fallback mode - only votes from trusted addresses will be used
returns._votePowerBlock: Vote power block for the current epoch

returns._assetMultipliers: weight of each asset in (multiasset) ftso, mutiplied by TERA
returns._assetWeightRatio: ratio of combined asset vp vs. native token vp (in BIPS)
returns._assets: the list of Assets that are accounted in vote
returns._totalVotePowerAsset: total combined asset vote power at block
returns._totalVotePowerNat: total native token vote power at block
returns._votePowerBlock: vote powewr block for given epoch

params._epochId: Id of the epoch in which the price hash was submitted
Id of the epoch in which the price hash was submitted

epochsConfiguration().notice: Returns current configuration of epoch state

finalizePriceEpoch(uint256,bool).notice: function finalizePriceReveal called by reward manager only on correct timing. if price reveal period for epoch x ended. finalize. iterate list of price submissions find weighted median find adjucant 50% of price submissions. Allocate reward for any price submission which is same as a "winning" submission

getCurrentPriceFromTrustedProviders().notice: Returns current asset price calculated from trusted providers

getCurrentPriceWithDecimals().notice: Returns current asset price and number of decimals

getCurrentPriceWithDecimalsFromTrustedPr.notice: Returns current asset price calculated from trusted providers and number of decimals

getEpochId(uint256).notice: Returns id of the epoch which was opened for price submission at the specified timestamp

getEpochPrice(uint256).notice: Returns asset price consented in specific epoch

getEpochPriceForVoter(uint256,address).notice: Returns asset price submitted by voter in specific epoch

getRandom(uint256).notice: Returns random number of the specified epoch

getVoteWeightingParameters().notice: Returns parameters necessary for approximately replicating vote weighting.

revealPriceSubmitter(address,uint256,uin.notice: Reveals submitted price during epoch reveal period - only price submitterThe hash of _price and _random must be equal to the submitted hashEmits PriceRevealed event

wNatVotePowerCached(address,uint256).notice: Get (and cache) wNat vote power for specified voter and given epoch id
